activities.name: get page
activities.description: 대표 제품의 생성 기간동안 토탈 건수

preCopyScript.value:
delete from cd_ods.tb_sf_neis_school_schedule_t
where atpt_ofcdc_sc_code = '@{variables('ATPT_OFCDC_SC_CODE')}'
and sd_schul_code = '@{variables('SD_SCHUL_CODE')}'

activities.name: Lookup API Info
activities.description: API 정보를 가져오기 위해 LOOKUP 파일에test

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('  SELECT CMONTH2 FROM CD_ODS.APS_SDC_PW_MST WHERE CMONTH2 BETWEEN ''202210'' AND ''202211'' GROUP BY CMONTH2 ORDER BY CMONTH2;' )

query.value:
SELECT 
    unnest(array['twitter','news','insta','community','youtube','blog']) as channel,
    '비에이치씨|BHC|bhc' as keyword,
    '20251221' as start_date,
    '20260120' as end_date

select distinct channel, keyword, start_date, end_date from 
(
WITH weekly_dates AS (
    SELECT 
        to_char(date_trunc('week', generate_series('2025-12-20'::date, CURRENT_DATE, '1 week')), 'YYYYMMDD') as start_date,
        to_char(date_trunc('week', generate_series('2025-12-20'::date, CURRENT_DATE, '1 week')) + interval '6 days', 'YYYYMMDD') as end_date
    FROM generate_series('2025-12-20'::date, CURRENT_DATE, '1 week') as week_series
)
SELECT 
    unnest(array['twitter','news','insta','community','youtube']) as channel,
    '비에이치씨|BHC|bhc' as keyword,
    start_date,
    end_date
FROM weekly_dates
)
order by  start_date,
    end_date

WITH id_pw_combinations AS (
  SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () as combo_id,
    id, 
    pw
  FROM (
    VALUES 
      ('p7kCTjIvjnAYEJGAvsl0', 'fabaTiAHhF'),
      ('YGhFoYAuLjwOeggaogEg', '2fBbQxicmX'),
      ('JKMVVBdEU58bv9gVHyeh', 'spp0sh3TAq')
  ) AS combinations(id, pw)
),
base_data AS (
  SELECT 
    topic,
    key_id,
    to_char(now() - interval '8 day', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date,
     to_char(now() - interval '2 day', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () as row_num
  FROM cd_portal.tb_topic_master
  where use_yn = 'Y'
and new_traker  = 'N'
)
SELECT 
  bd.topic,
  bd.key_id,
  bd.start_date,
  bd.end_date,
  ipc.id,
  ipc.pw
FROM base_data bd
JOIN id_pw_combinations ipc ON ipc.combo_id = ((bd.row_num - 1) % 3) + 1

delete from  cd_ods.tb_naver_datalab_keyword_t;

select 1 as success;

with vw_channel as
(
 select unnest ( array['blog','twitter','news','insta','community','youtube']) as channel
)
select a.channel, b.gubun, b.keyword, b.include_keyword
from vw_channel a, cd_ods.tb_qp_news_keyword b 
;

activities.name: API REQ INFO
activities.description: API INDEX 호출 정보를 가져오기 위해 설정 파일에서INDEX 번호를 읽어옵니다.

activities.name: ORA GET CNT
activities.description: 저장된 값의 Total 값을 확인하기 위해 DB조

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT NVL(max(qty), 0) as total_cnt FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = ''', pipeline().parameters.ServiceId, ''' ORDER BY row_id DESC ')

text.value:
INSERT INTO cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq (type, row_id, qty, crt_dt, crt_user) 
VALUES (
  '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}'
  , (SELECT NVL(MAX(row_id), 0) + 1 FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}')
  , '@{variables('endIdx')}'
  , to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhhmiss')
, 'system'
);
